headline: Morgan Stanley Bitcoin Guidance Could Channel $80B Into Crypto
summary: Morgan Stanley has updated its investment guidance and is now suggesting that some clients allocate a small slice of their portfolios to Bitcoin. If taken seriously, that shift could send as much as $40 to $80 billion into the crypto market. The bank is now referring to Bitcoin as a ...

headline: Morgan Stanley cuts TL, LTL earnings outlook
summary: Morgan Stanley lowered earnings expectations for publicly traded truckload and less-than-truckload carriers on Monday. The post Morgan Stanley cuts TL, LTL earnings outlook appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: 2025 Buyback Spree Is Top-Heavy As Fewer Firms Repurchase Shares
summary: American companies continue to buy back their shares at a record pace in 2025. However, the actual number of companies announcing buybacks has actually shrunk. Read more here...

headline: Morgan Stanley’s Wilson says U.S. valuations supported as earnings recovery builds
summary: Investing.com -- Morgan Stanley equity strategist Michael Wilson said U.S. equity valuations appear justified as the economy enters an early-cycle phase, with improving earnings momentum and structural inflation supporting stock prices.

headline: Looking at the Narrative for Trip.com Group After Analyst Upgrades and Share Buybacks
summary: Trip.com Group’s consensus analyst price target has inched higher, rising from $82.70 to $83.54 after recent earnings. This upward revision reflects increased confidence in future performance, supported by solid volume growth and an improved financial outlook. Stay tuned to see how market expectations continue to shift and discover ways to stay ahead of the evolving narrative around Trip.com Group stock. headline: U.S. consumer concerns about inflation at lowest level since early 2022: survey
summary: Investing.com -- Consumer concerns about inflation have fallen to their lowest level in nearly three years, according to Morgan Stanley’s latest U.S. Consumer Pulse Survey, even as analysts warn that tariffs could still lead to future price pressures.

headline: Wall Street Pivots: Morgan Stanley Officially Recommends Exposure To Crypto, Especially Bitcoin
summary: One of the world’s oldest investment institutions, Morgan Stanley, has advised clients to allocate 2-4% of their investment portfolios to crypto. With a strong spotlight on Bitcoin as a “scarce asset, akin to digital gold,” Morgan Stanley’s suggestion is a pivot in Wall Street’s stance toward digital assets. On 5 ...
